articles.description: Pubs and bars are banned from serving booze without food - but there are now some settings where people can have a drink without a meal
articles.content:
The Government has announced new guidance this week that will permit the sale of alcohol without a substantial meal in some Tier 2 settings. 
Under previous guidance, any hospitality business in Tie… [+3805 chars]

articles.title: Major new music venue for west London in £1.3billion Olympia redevelopment - Evening Standard
articles.description: Many of the biggest names in music appeared at Olympia during its heyday including Jimi Hendrix, Rod Stewart and Pink Floyd
articles.content:
Many of the biggest names in music appeared at Olympia during its heyday including Jimi Hendrix, Rod Stewart, Pink Floyd, Status Quo, Procol Harum, The Cure and Primal Scream.

articles.title: Mariah Carey All I Want For Christmas Is You set for UK chart FIRST this week - Express
